metadata.title: CVE-2023-2124 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s XFSfile system in how a user restores an XFS image after failure (with a dirtylog journal). This flaw allows a local user to crash or potentiallyescalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
